lines.text: [last lines]
You know what the difference is between you and me, Violet?
No.
Me neither.
What did she do to you?
Everything you couldn't.
You don't wanna shoot me, Vi. Do ya. Do ya? I know you don't.
Caesar, you don't know shit.
That's a great tattoo. Beautiful labrys. Are you surprised I know what it is?
Maybe.
I have a tattoo. Would you like to see it?
You seem uncomfortable. Do I make you nervous, Corky?
No.
[drinks from beer bottle]
Thirsty, maybe?
I'm not apologizing for what I did. I'm apologizing for what I didn't do.
What are you doing?
Isn't it obvious? I'm trying to seduce you.
Why?

Because I want... to. I've wanted to ever since I saw you that day in the elevator. I know you don't believe me, but I can prove it to you. You can't believe what you see. But you can believe... what you feel. I've been thinking about you all day.
We're not that different, Corky.
Ah, let's see. This is the part where you tell me what matters is on the inside, and that inside of you there's a little dyke just like me.
No, she's nothing like you. She's a whole lot smarter than you are.
When you get tired of Cagney and Lacey, find me.

they get in a room, they talk about it. They start to plan. It's kind of like flirting. It's kind of like... foreplay, 'cause the more they talk about it, the wetter they get. The only difference is, I can fuck someone I've just met. But to steal? I need to know someone like I know myself.

Cesare, you gotta do me a favor. A personal favor for me. You gotta start respecting Johnny, the way you respect me. Capisce? Good, good. And you, Johnny. You gotta stop acting stupid. You gonna earn this respect that Cesare's gonna give. Capisce? Good, done!
If there's one thing I can't stand about sleeping with women, it's all the fucking mind-reading.
You planned this whole thing. You dropped that earring down the sink on purpose, didn't you?
If I say yes, will you take your hand away?
No.
Yes.
Caesar, I'm leaving.
What? Oh, come on, I didn't use one of the good towels.

[after making love with Violet]
I can see again!
Try not to steal anything on your way out...
We make our own choices, we pay our own prices.
I have this image of you - inside of me - like a part of me.
Gino doesn't speak much English, or at least he pretends not to.
Shelly knows what I am. He saw me in a bar with another woman.
Yeah, I suppose he just wants to watch.
So, Ceasar works for the Mafia?
Strange, nobody calls it that anymore. Ceasar calls it "the Business."
[Caesar is aiming his gun at Corky, who is tied up - 'bound' as the title has it]

God. I should have seen this coming the minute I met you. Everybody knows your kind can't be trusted. Fucking queers make me sick. But you made a fatal mistake. You tried fucking the wrong guy. And I swear to you that I'm going to kill you for it. Where's my money?
Don't tell him.
Shut up, Violet!
He can't kill you.

[He aims the gun at Violet]
Violet!
Not until he has the money.
[He fires the gun at the wall behind Violet to scare and silence her]
Now. Where is it?
Lick me.
Where is my money?
Either pull the trigger or get that fucking thing out of my face.
Oh, Johnny hits on me all the time. He hits on anything in high heels.
So what are you saying? You don't have sex with men?
I don't.
Oh, for Christ's sake, Violet, I heard you. Thin walls, remember?

I'm a dead man, Johnnie? I'm a fucking dead man? Guess again, Johnnie. Who's the dead man? Who? Who's dead, fuckface? Who? Who? I can't hear you, Johnnie. Guess again. Take another guess, Johnnie. Take another fucking guess.
Now I'm gonna ask you 10 times, Shelly, 10 times.
I can fuck someone I just met. But to steal I have to know someone like I know myself.
They're just cops.
You can't kill me.
Oh really? Why not?
I could be lying.

[to Corky]
Hold the elevator. Thanks.
Either pull the trigger or get that fucking thing out of my face.
I want what's mine; I want half the money. We get rid of Mickey, and no one else dies. No one. Say, "Yes, I understand."
Yes, I unnerstan'.
It's fuckin' dark in here!
To steal, I need to know someone like I know myself.
You think you know me like that?

[after being shot]
Don't shoot.
